verbs.description: [V: suspects] [ARG1: tie] up clerk douse clerk in fuel and set fire to convenience store in forsyth county deputies are searching for two men they say bound a store clerk and doused him in fuel before setting fire to the building with the victim still inside shortly after 11 p m saturday forsyth county deputies responded to a reported robbery at the stop and save located at 6641 styers ferry road clemmons the store is within the city limits of lewisville davie county north carolina ford f-350 davie county n c forsyth county sheriff office lewisville forsyth county north carolina forsyth county clemmons fire department vienna fire department forsyth county sheriffs office forsyth county fire department robbery lewisville fire department clemmons
